====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|くつ|acc=2|acc_ref=NHK,DJR,SMK5|dev=1}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=くつ}}.  Found in the ''{{w|Man'yōshū}}'' poetry compilation, completed circa 759.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

Ultimate derivation unclear.  Some Japanese sources suggest a borrowing from or cognate with Korean {{ko-l|구두||shoes}}, but then some Korean sources suggest that the Korean term was borrowed from Japanese {{lang|ja|靴}} (''kutsu'', “shoes”).

===Alternative forms===
* {{l|ja|沓}}, {{l|ja|履}}, {{l|ja|鞋}} {{qualifier|all less common}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|くつ}}

#*: {{lang|ja|信濃道者 伊麻能波里美知 可里婆祢尓 安思布麻之<奈牟> 久都波氣和我世}}
#*: {{ja-usex|信%濃%道 は 　今の墾り道 　刈りばね に 　足 踏ましなむ 　'''沓'''はけ我が背|しな%ぬ%ぢ は 　いま の はりみち 　かりばね に 　あし ふましなむ 　'''くつ''' はけ わがせ|the Shinano road has just been opened; wear '''shoes''', my brother / my dear, so you do not step on the brush stubble [in your bare feet]}}
